content:
# I have successfully harvested 10 stones and now have 10 iron ores in my inventory as well. 
# With the necessary resources gathered, I can now proceed to craft the stone furnace.

# First, I will ensure I have enough materials to craft the stone furnace. 
# I need to check if I have the required resources in my inventory.

inventory = inspect_inventory()  # Check current inventory
print(f"Current inventory: {inventory}")  # Display the current inventory for verification. 

# Now I will craft the stone furnace if I have enough stones. 
if inventory['stone'] >= 5:
    craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Craft the stone furnace using the stones.
